items.content_html: WallSwitch: Automatic Wallpaper Engine manager for gamers. Detects game launches, closes wallpapers, and restores them when gaming ends. Lightweight Electron + React app for seamless desktop experience. Optimize system resources with one-click setup.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management.
